content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

The image shows two separate structures made of building blocks:

## Left Structure:
- 3 orange cylindrical blocks arranged in an inverted "L" shape (2 vertical, 1 horizontal on top)
- 1 yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across the middle of the vertical cylinders
- 1 yellow dome-shaped cap on the top cylinder

## Right Structure:
- A red base with two arches (appears to be two connected blocks)
- 1 orange vertical cylinder in the center
- Several yellow blocks around the cylinder (2 vertical, 1 horizontal)
- 1 orange triangular roof on top of the cylinder
- 1 green vertical rectangular block at the far right

Total number of layers: The structures have approximately 3-4 layers each.

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

For the left structure:
- Block 9: Orange vertical cylinder (3 of these)
- Block 5 or 6: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (1 of these)
- Block 12: Yellow dome cap (1 of these)

For the right structure:
- Block 1 and 2: Red arch blocks (forming the base)
- Block 9: Orange vertical cylinder (1 of these)
- Block 7 and 8: Yellow vertical rectangular blocks (2 of these)
- Block 5 or 6: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (1 of these)
- Block 15: Orange triangular roof (1 of these)
- Block 4: Green vertical rectangular block (1 of these)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 2
    Step3: Move block with index 9
    Step4: Move block with index 7
    Step5: Move block with index 8
    Step6: Move block with index 6
    Step7: Move block with index 15
    Step8: Move block with index 4
    Step9: Move block with index 9
    Step10: Move block with index 9
    Step11: Move block with index 5
    Step12: Move block with index 12
}
```

This assembly sequence first builds the right structure (steps 1-8) and then the left structure (steps 9-12).
